urls.title: Trinidad & Tobago - Travel Authorisation
urls.description: 1. Non Nationals who are NOT FULLY VACCINATED will NOT be allowed entry into Trinidad and Tobago at this time. 2. Travellers may begin the Application process 72 hours before arrival in Trinidad and Tobago. 3. All Travellers (including minors) must submit a Negative COVID-19 PCR or Lab Acquired Antigen test result (Home Antigen test results will not be accepted). The test should have been taken no earlier than seventy-two (72) hours prior to arrival in Trinidad and Tobago. Proof of this must be presented

data.text:
Cari your tour guide has received 35% more miles for her next vacay.

Try the new feature where you can Buy or Gift as few or as many miles as you like before August 31, and you can also receive 35% more miles!

Learn More: https://t.co/yufcG5YmvO

#iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean https://t.co/V1dBIe9ejv

Meet Cari the Coconut! 🥥Our new Tour Guide who'll take you on your next adventure with us and bring deals to share with you. 😉
Cari has been longing to travel and has checked our Travel Essential Centre page for all the info for her next trip. ✈️#iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean https://t.co/08A6GfVrjf

data.text: @__eleciaaa @__eleciaaa please send us a private message with details for us to better assist. -Kezia
We've brought on board a special friend to be your new Tour Guide. Can you guess the name? Stay tuned for the name reveal tomorrow! #iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean https://t.co/mS3QDeKYc4
@SableJoy_ @SableJoy_ we're sorry, but no not at this time. -Emma

Happy National Best Friend Day! Sometimes all you need is your best friend, plane tickets and a great adventure! Tag your best friend! #iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean #nationalbestfriendday #repost

📷 Photo via: @kemzkemz https://t.co/L1NmFuS2pa

Happy World Environment Day 2021 🌍🏖️🌴 
Let’s all be a part of #generationrestoration and take action to protect and restore our natural ecosystems to ensure our beautiful Caribbean remains a paradise for years to come.  
#iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean #worldenvironmentday https://t.co/5GhKQ8pxBw

@JulioMa12012274 Hi @JulioMa12012274, we're sorry but our service to Cuba remains suspended at this time, until further notice. 

-Emma

Caribbean Airlines extends greeting to the Catholic community on the blessed and holy feast of Corpus Christi.
In an ever changing world the Holy Eucharist is a constant reminder of God’s Changeless Love.
#iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean https://t.co/ZqSfyiESz3

Click link the link below to book, and visit our Travel Essentials Centre to view health and safety requirements and for all the info you need for a hassle-free trip.  

https://t.co/ErleiU1y2X

This LITE fare will include: 
 
✔ One free carry-on bag 
✔ One free personal bag 
✔ Advanced seat selection 
 
*Return trip. Subject to fare availability.  Travel period 25th June – 4th September 2021.

✨Low fares are here!✨

A thread:

Nothing beats a dose of vitamin sea, and we can confirm that Mobay is  the place to be!  

Just in time for summer, fly from New York to Montego Bay and back from as low as US$318* (includes taxes). https://t.co/dAKH6ixoTV

✈️Happy Flight Attendant Appreciation Day! Today we celebrate all the efforts and hard work of all our flight attendants and all they do to keep passengers safe and comfortable. We appreciate you! 
#iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean #flightattendantappreciationday https://t.co/6eqwpEz8ff

Happy Memorial Day to our friends and families in the U.S.A. Today, we remember the service, sacrifice and commitment of all who served and contributed. 
#iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean #memorialdayusa https://t.co/eC9NnklJss

data.text:
@rae_lamode @rae_lamode we guide you to please contact our Reservations Call Center at 625-7200 for information on any changes to your scheduled flight. 

-Emma

Happy Indian Arrival Day Trinidad and Tobago. Together, we celebrate and embrace our nation’s journey, heritage and culture which is rooted in diversity and inclusion. #iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean #indianarrivaldaytrinidadandtobago https://t.co/0oyv3ZU4h4

Kick-start summer in Dominica! Fly New York to Dominica from US$540*(taxes included) roundtrip.
LITE fare includes:✔️One free carry-on bag ✔️One free personal bag ✔️Advanced seat selection.
*Conditions apply. Book until 15th June for travel 24 June - 29 July 2021.
#iflycaribbean https://t.co/f5bawtZs8W

Today, we join with all Guyanese to celebrate Guyana’s 55th Independence Anniversary. One People, One Nation, One Destiny.

#iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean #guyanaindependence https://t.co/QQGgpG1EOi

@FedoPlanets @FedoPlanets this service is fully booked at this. You can make arrangements to travel via Guyana and connect to New York. Please contact our Reservations Department between 0700hrs and 1900hrs for further guidance.  

-Kezia
